attributes.action: consider honouring Mr. Derrick Sharp of Norwich for his services to the licensing trade and his work with the Red Cross.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now 76 and happily retired, Derrick has been mine host at the Perseverance, the Bread & Cheese (both in Adelaide St, Norwich) as the Nelson in Nelson Street, Norwich during his working years. A most jovial, generous and compassionate elderly gentleman, ex-RAF, who is known and loved by everyone who's ever met him and one of Norwich's great characters, Derrick deserves to be recognised for his ability to inject happiness into the lives of all he meets.
